# Change: 'createView'

Create View

## XML Sample ##

{% highlight xml %}
<createView catalogName="cat"
        replaceIfExists="true"
        schemaName="public"
        viewName="A String">A String</createView>
{% endhighlight %}

## SQL Generated From Above Sample (MySQL)

{% highlight sql %}
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW cat.A String AS A String;


{% endhighlight %}
